title: 大家来算算死在谁手里的次数最多
author: l452108
txt_content:
我的是小白，远程你懂的，说多了都是泪啊！{:10_530:}
[groupid=1239]梦幻群组[/groupid]

replies.author: V5法克鱿
replies.txt_content: 死在苦力怕。。

replies.author: 柠檬柠檬柠
replies.txt_content: 我死在OP手里最多，因为，我就是腐竹……

replies.author: foxt21
replies.txt_content: 死在自杀（雾）

replies.author: 罪域之骨
replies.txt_content: 我老是被猪人推到岩浆里.....

replies.author: hxp1999
replies.txt_content: 当然是死在基友
小白，我也不知道为什么。

replies.author: 我的世界201
replies.txt_content: 死在基友手里= =

replies.author: wlmy
replies.txt_content: 当然是大名顶顶的僵尸。。。

replies.author: mojump666
replies.txt_content: 死在pvp 最多

replies.author: 镜钥钥
replies.txt_content: 死在/kill的手里

replies.author: MC_Diaomao
replies.txt_content: 猪人  被围殴

replies.author: 天狗
replies.txt_content:
基本不怎么死
除了空岛舍不得吃东西
想留着做任务
然后饿死QAQ

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 我死在跑酷地图里的次数最多！！！统计了下最少死了2000次

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 当然死在虚空的次数最多啦

replies.author: 233dren
replies.txt_content: 死在玩家手里最多，因为我经常玩饥饿游戏和职业战争

replies.author: 银色十字梦
replies.txt_content: 死在自己手里

replies.author: CCTV88
replies.txt_content: 死于苦力怕爆炸的时候最多

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
1.小白
2.苦力怕
3.凋零

replies.author: C_T_F_Y
replies.txt_content: 我自己啊哈哈哈

小白咯，每次都是他杀死我。
5555~

replies.author: sfwwgs
replies.txt_content: 绝对小白  很烦在远处打

replies.author: 奥义小杰
replies.txt_content: 死在NPC里
